refineActivities.label: Enhance Content (AI)
refineActivities.description: This feature uses generative AI to add, update, or reorder records based on user-provided instructions.

refineActivities.label: Request Feedback
refineActivities.description: This feature lets users send stakeholders a link to provide feedback in the app, without requiring stakeholders to have their own accounts.

refineActivities.label: Compile Feedback (AI)
refineActivities.description: This feature uses AI to process stakeholder feedback and update focus area content accordingly.

refineActivities.label: Remove Focus Area
refineActivities.description: This feature allows users to soft-delete all data for a specific focus area, which can be restored later via 'Edit Content' or 'Recover Versions'.

refineActivities.label: Recover Versions
refineActivities.description: This feature allows users to restore any previous version of a specific focus area as a new active version, while preserving all prior versions.

refineActivities.label: Edit Content
refineActivities.description: This feature allows users to manually edit, remove, and restore records.
